segments.text: That boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's standing on that stool; it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really determined to get those cookies, isn't he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous just watching him; it's like he's about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mom knows they're doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balancing is almost impressive, but it's also really scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets down safely before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how kids will risk anything for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
